resources.string: Oghma Infinium is a quiz app based around the lore and games of the "Elder Scrolls" series. \n \nCurrently, the game is based purely on standard quiz questions each consisting of a question and four possible answers.

How to play: 
Press the "Play game!" button in the main menu and choose any quiz to your liking from the categories. 
 
In the quiz you will be presented with a question and four possible answers. 
 
Selecting the correct question will result in a green highlight on the button pressed, red if a wrong answer is chosen. 
 
As you choose an answer a new quiz question will appear, until the end of the quiz. 
 
At the end of the quiz, a screen will appear displaying your score. 
 
Your score will be saved, and can be found in the "Scores" section, which you can navigate to from the main menu.
